title: New Beginnings: Turning Pain Into Purpose
description: New Turning Pain into Purpose addresses the many issues and behaviors that Christians may face which often times keep them in bondage to their past. In New Beginnings Carmelite speaks from a voice of authority and boldness using practical biblical scriptures and principles that releases a person from their past to walk freely in their God ordained purpose. New Beginnings reveals the very wisdom that stabilized Carmelite and placed her in position to live out her God given purpose. She offers words for many circumstances that Christians may experience and points the reader in the direction of definitive purpose, joy, self-awareness and self-worth that can only be accomplished when it is done through the power of Jesus Christ. In New Beginnings, Carmelite erases the ability to remain a victim and challenges you to embrace victory.
author: Carmelite Price
